entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build system not sensitive to EXTRA_CFLAGS and EXTRA_CXXFLAGS #61859
  • ActivityTraceFlags is not reflected in Activity Id when updated after activity start() #61857
    7.0.0
  • [WASM] Allow users to selectively AOT certain assemblies #61855
    Future
  • openSUSE - upgrade using 'zypper up' command upgrades 3.1 host to 6.0 and removes 'dotnet' command #61849
  • [mini] Support stack protector codegen #61845
  • [Android] Support creating NX DSOs for AOT #61844
    6.0.x
  • Regression in TimeZoneInfo for "Central Brazilian Standard Time" in .NET 6.0 #61842
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient: An asterisk in NO_PROXY is not handled properly #61840
  • NullReferenceException in Marshal.DestroyStructure with embedded structs containing delegates #61839
  • FileStream does not lock file on mounted filesystem #61836
  • HttpClient with proxy throws when BadGateway #61835
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\hugeexpr1\\hugeexpr1.cmd #61825
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/gcdump/gcdump/gcdump.sh #61824
    7.0.0

Closed

  • How do we choose the zlib version to use? #61852
    Future
  • JsonElement does not respect JsonSerializerOptions #61843
  • Xamarin.iOS net6 builds are seeing ~10% larger AOT data sizes #53740
    7.0.0
  • WebAssembly debugging does not work with Firefox #37755
    Future
  • System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive: initial and decompressed byte arrays are unequal. #61834
  • String interpolation combining string format and brackets is interpreted incorrectly #61838
  • Rfc2898DeriveBytes(string, byte[]) does not throw ArgumentException when 'salt' is less than 8 bytes #61833
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix failing tests after nested static class evaluation fix. #61509
    7.0.0
  • Configure Area Pod Triage board for Eric / Jeff #61829
    7.0.0
  • The mscordbi.dll for .NET 5.0.12 is missing from symbol servers #61775
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread/GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread.sh #61823
  • JsonConverter doesn't allow injection of parameters #42975
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1478605 #61858
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Test chromebug #61856
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • [wasm] Force console #61854
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Mono hot reload reorg and beginning (disabled) add method support #61853
    area-EnC-mono
  • JIT: refactor to allow OSR to switch to optimized #61851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][wasm] debug multiple runtimes #61848
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve some cases of bad debug info propagation in optimized code #61846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] workaround test results corruption #61841
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Android crypto asserts #61827
    area-System.Security, os-android, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update area-owners to reflect Libraries Area Pod changes #61642
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.CommandLine` #57432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Allow runtimeconfig StartupHooks and Environment StartupHooks to both be present #61461
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • If no diff found in asmdiff create dummy zip file for AzDo to succeed #61828
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables` #57433
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable DD117522 test #61585
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Integration of changes in shared files from runtimelab/NativeAOT #61655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Switch IP mapping lists to use jitstd::list #61822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand Regex One/Notone/Setlazy simple code gen support to Lazy #61784
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Reduce allocations for CreateDirectory #61777
    area-System.IO, os-linux, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Disable several failing tests on iOSSimulator arm64 #61826
  • Include arch specific headers in standalone JITs #61800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to skip pause_* tests again #61793
  • [iOS] Skip System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListenerTests.XmlWriterTraceListenerTests on iOS/tvOS #61807
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve superpmi-asmdiffs AzDO pipeline robustness #61819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DllImportGenerator] Don't flag methods with known unsupported UnmanagedType #61808
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add JitDisasmWithDebugInfo #61780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update `GetPinnableReference()` usage in multi-step custom type marshalling #61539
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove SupportedOSPlatformAttribute("windows") from LdapSessionOption #61388
    area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use reflection or a compile-time only shim assembly to reference unexposed corelib types. #61802
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement use GeneratedDllImport #61805
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • [wasm] Disable System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests for AOT #61803
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono] Don't use recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #61677
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Exclude the managed code around libproc on iOS/tvOS (#61590) #61659
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-ios
  • Actually use TargetOS=AnyOS in the build-test-job (Try 2) #61801
  • Extract ECAlgorithm from ECDsa and ECDiffieHellman #61753
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Brand release/6.0-maui branch appropriately #61792
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add Clear() to MemoryCache #57631
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 7.0.0
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Rework startup in test-main.js #61752
    arch-wasm
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable some skipped Android tests #61771
    area-System.Net
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • Vectorize SpanHelpers<T>.IndexOf #60974
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Use char override Writer for System.Private.Xml #61722
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • [System.Text.Json] Move inline throw statements to `ThrowHelper` #61746
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant based on the Clang impl #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [wasm] Add a new supported signature for pinvokes #61667
    arch-wasm
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Add test for ignoring stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add nested static attribute support. #61508
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimize XmlTextEncoder.Write #61773
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61660
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Enable memory-mapped stress log on Linux #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BinSkim warnings from NativeAOT Linux binaries #1738

Closed

  • Enable FEATURE_GENERIC_MATH #1301

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1737

Merged

  • Make MetadataFieldLayoutAlgorithm shareable #1736
    area-NativeAOT
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for more unary and binary ops #1705

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add field to LclVarDsc to represent LLVM arg index #1716
  • Custom marshaller work. #1723

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet clean` should be more resilient to TFM changes #22692

Closed

  • `dotnet complete` behaves with `Contains` instead of `StartWith` #12631
    Discussion
  • .NET 6 GzipStream.Flush method implementation questions #22671
  • Latest dotnet sdk 3.1 doesn't build project with C#10 #22662
  • Add NET6_0_OR_GREATER preprocessor directive #22625

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix version comparison for dotnet tool install #22684
    Area-Tools

Merged

  • Switch the non-windows test builds to also run helix and non-helix in parallel. #22284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't split collect command into multiple collect commands #22666
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Change messages for ILLink #22636
    Area-ILLink
  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Blazor AoT Publish Integration Tests #22682
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore, DO NOT MERGE
  • Update Test project WindowsRuntimeComponent to current framework #22661
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `this` not showing up in a property initializer #57886
  • Change Namespace to Match Folder Structure Breaks Razor Using Clause #57885
  • List-patterns: symbols not correctly updated with nullability information #57884
    17.1
  • Debugger evaluator calls new ToString instead of Object.ToString #57880
  • Rename tracking conflicts with Generate Method and cannot be disabled #57876
  • Update corefx dependencies to 6.0.0 #57875
    17.1
  • Visual Studio 2022 IntelliSense not working for added NamingRules #57874
  • Go to Symbol does not work for record fields #57873

Closed

  • List-patterns: can we avoid unwrapping placeholders manually during lowering? #57810
    17.1
  • Follow up on the issue with duplicating `when` expressions in DAG #57730

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix replace-prop-with-method (and the opposite) when references are in linked files. #57891
    Area-IDE
  • Search less files when searching in global suppressions. #57890
    Area-IDE
  • Properly support TableEntryNavigateEventArgs.ShouldActivate #57889
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure we cache the previous item when two items are considered equal #57888
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Unify the namespace for our FatalError type #57887
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge FixIdDefinition with the same name #57883
    Area-IDE
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • for pr validation #57879
    Area-IDE
  • Unify representation of an implicit `Index` indexer over an array and non-array types. #57877
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57872
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57862
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building (Arcade7) #57637
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Backport integration test fixes to dev17.0-vs-deps #57878
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add basic implementation of new rename UI #57686
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Merges/main to features/param nullchecking #57866
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57894
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57893
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57892
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch go-to-impl to be entirely async/non-blocking. #57861
    Area-IDE
  • [SourceLink] Use correct encoding for embedded text #57683
    Area-IDE
  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for lsp jsonrpc request handling #57834
    Area-IDE
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building (Arcade7) #57822
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Clean-up/enhance completion telemetry #57868
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Avoid eagerly running formatting or simplification for Extract Method #57838
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify implementation of SourceGeneratedFileItemSource #57691
    Area-IDE
  • Port BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit to the new test harness #57738
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Verification of Patch Request (The following request in image gave 500 error which can be prevented but do not) #38540
  • Design time generated code for ternary templated expressions gives false positive diagnostics in Visual Studio #38538
  • Ability to run a specific test project on Helix on demand #38537
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Update our processes to reserve time as part of milestone for better validation #38535
    7.0-preview1
  • Restore and build only for specific feature areas #38533
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Signalr AddToGroupAsync possible race condition #38531
  • Build the SharedFx installer for Win-arm64 #38530
    6.0.x
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #38529
  • Customize ValidationMessage classes #38528
  • AuthorizeRouteView is missing the Policy Property #38525
  • After .NET 6 upgrade, debugger crashes when redirecting from one blazor wasm app to another #38523
  • StaticWebAssets.xml missing #38522
  • Blazor WebAssembly: make ChangeEventArgs.Value work both ways for the scope of the event handler #38520
  • Issues using debugger in Blazor WASM project since .NET 6 upgrade #38519
  • Blazor wasm: Reference Javascript function with IJSObjectReference #38517
  • .NET 6 How to get an instance of IHubContext #38516
  • Create Blazor component and associated style sheet. #38526
    Backlog
  • After update to core6 strange error, browser-wasm #38514
  • .NET 6 & VS2022 minimal API templates #38513
  • Hot Reload not working on converted project #38512

Closed

  • Blazor JSInterop failure on Chrome/Edge #38501
  • Cookies rejected while switching to minimal hosting model syntax #38434
    6.0.x
  • [Blazor] Availability of User in Startup #35611
    Discussions
  • Blazor Server: Websocket problems with WAN-optimization / change port for SignalR / websocket connection #38472
  • Blazor: File referenced in nuget .props file but the file itself is not in the nuget package #38294
  • Blazor lazy loading and plugin architecture #38497
  • Blazor httpcontext is renewed upon refreshing the page #38475
  • Perf improvement: json_nodejs #38244
  • Latest .NET SDK 7.0.100-alpha.1.21558.2 not found. Blocking development #38485
  • Core-React not started API(Server Side) #38463
  • AspNet.Core.Components Version 6.0 Causes CRC Error #38313

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Resolve component governance bugs #38539
    tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/2.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38536
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38534
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] Move off of expiring machine pools #38532
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix some fast up to date check issues in VS #32140
    area-infrastructure, retrospective-action
  • [main] Update Docker images, queues, etc. #38427
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump .NET SDK again #38506
    area-infrastructure
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Support SkipStatusCodePages on endpoints and authorized routes #38509
    area-web-frameworks
  • Use window.document for React-Native #38340
    area-signalr

    7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FlexLayout wrapping behaves oddly on Windows #3482
  • FlexLayout Basis doesn't update live on Windows #3481
  • RadioButton crashes on Windows #3480
  • ProgressBar doesn't render on Windows #3479
  • Image not displaying background color on Windows #3478
  • NRE when typing into Editor on Windows #3477
  • Shell content doesn't resize when navigating between pages #3476
  • Bindable FlexLayout empty on Windows #3475
  • iOS App Crashes if Hyperlink is Clicked in MAUI Blazor Project - NullReferenceException #3474
  • [WinUI] Implement `SetSemanticFocus` for WinUI #3473
  • Spike SetSemanticFocus API #3472
  • Border content alignment not centered on Windows #3471
  • FlyoutBackgroundColor doesn't work on Windows #3470
  • Error running page with images #3469
  • Unable to delete bin folder while VS is open #3468
  • OnPaste for Edit control(s) #3466
  • [Android|Windows] Only can render one CollectionView #3464
  • [Android] Crash: Canvas trying to draw too large #3463
  • [Windows] ContentView not rendering until resize Window #3462
  • [Windows] Layout issues #3461
  • [Windows] CarouselView not rendering #3460
  • [Windows] Images are not rendered if the extension is not specified #3459
  • ListView throws a IllegalStateException IllegalStateException #3455
    6.0.200-preview.11

PullRequests

Created

  • iOS 13+ always uses the scenes if there is one registered in the manifest #3454
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Several fixes and changes to the dispatchers #3453
    area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • Fix iOS Navigation #3467
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3452
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update Entry and Editor to use Windows 11 styles #3444
  • [Core,Controls] Remove legacy Log and use ILogger #3401
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Place parentheses around IS NULL only when needed (7.0) #26767
  • Test SaveChangesAsync_accepts_changes_with_ConfigureAwait_true_22841 seems flaky #26763
  • Can't concat/union two IQueryable<> of types inherited from one parent #26762
  • Use expression bodies for query tests #26760
    MQ

Closed

  • Remove Obsolete code #22549
    7.0.0
  • IDbContextFactory async contract vs covariance #26630
  • Irrelevant value in the shadow property leads to an wrong state of the nested entity in the StateManager #26499
  • Throw when using relational FromSqlRaw with Cosmos, or vice-versa #26502
    7.0.0
  • ColumnOrder with different behaviour between Create and Alter table ? #26765
  • Robust and extensible SQL precedence/parentheses mechanism #23895
    7.0.0
  • Query performance decrease when updating from 2.1 to 5.0 #26747
  • Query: Lift table from subquery when joining if no additional operations #21321
    7.0.0
  • boolean criteria are not being translated directly #26764
  • EF Core 6 reports variable name '@XXX' has already been declared #26754
  • Bug in Navigation Fixer when replacing records that contain a HashSet #26745
  • Reverse Engineering issue with user permissions #26716
  • EF Core 6.0 System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'provider') #26624
  • Not synced data for non-backing filed properties #26606
  • Clean up examples for AddDbContext #23270
    6.0.0
  • ToSqlQuery method not working in 6.0.0 #26685
  • Use hrefs for links #26443
    7.0.0
  • Update Attach docs to reference cascade delete/delete orphans timing #26718
    7.0.0
  • Table and column arguments flipped for usage of RelationalStrings.DefaultValueXXX #26591
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Expression bodies for query test base classes #26761
  • Reference conceptual docs for examples #26759

Merged

  • Remove Obsolete code #26766
    auto-merge
  • Skip flaky SaveChangesAsync_accepts_changes_with_ConfigureAwait_true_22841 #26768
    auto-merge
  • Query: Throw error for unhandled derived query root expression #26579
  • Test mechanism to automatically rewrite baselines in source code #26723
  • Fix some markdown language syntax highlights #26680
    community-contribution
  • Fix some docs issues #26755
  • Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are… #26641
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Query: Avoid parethesis around binary operations when used with AND/OR #26661
    auto-merge
  • Query: Fix double negation in SQL generation #26734
  • Put parentheses around IS NULL for non-bool operands #26653
  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Test on .NET Framework #26733
  • test and fix for Issue #26742 #26758
    community-contribution
  • [6.0.x] Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
    Servicing-consider
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495
  • Update NuGet packages #26751
  • Tools: Use App.config on .NET Core #26752

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • `sudo` breaks some Linux distro builds using source-build #12634
  • .NET 6 installer fails builds of Azure Function projects on macOS #11951

PullRequests

Created

  • source-build patches needed to get 6.0.2xx building #12718

Updated

  • Enable targeting 5.0 for arm64 #12675
  • Resolve Component Governance alerts #12604
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add some additional distros to the CI matrix #12141
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12706
